titles.title: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
9/26/2008--Introduced.
Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employer-provided transportation benefits (i.e., commuting and parking costs, transit passes) under tax-qualified flexible spending arrangements.
